column3: Latest;Kampot: Thousands of dead fish were found floating in a waterway for unknown reasons.------The incident
column4: which happened in the early afternoon on the 17th and again on November 18
column6: was near an ice factory in Kompong Trach district
column7: Kampot province.------People living nearby say they believe the dead fish were due to poisoning from something that flowed into the water.------Yeung Vau of the Fisheries Department
column8: said authorities were waiting for the site to be examined by a professional.------On the afternoon of November 18
column11: the Governor of Kampong Trach District
column12: urged officials of the department to conduct a thorough examination to find out why the fish had died. ------KAMPUCHETHMEY
